I hate this game worst 773 hours of my life :)

You never win at this game. You just get a little better each time. Until you run into a killer with NOED. Then you just die.
Great game to play with a group of friends and fun to play on your own when you run and slash survivors as a disfigured man with a chainsaw.
you wanna kill people as a horror archetype or run away from a horror archetype, check this game out its good.

I've played both survivor and killer and the game is flawed in both sectors. The list I could write on it would be big. The main complaint I have is nothing is paired evenly at all the perks the skill levels nothing. Roblox does a better  version of this game no perks and if people camp the life freezes. People are toxic on  both sides. Sometimes you get teammates and good killers and those are good days or on flip side you get good adversaries. People rage quit, camp, don't run, troll both in character and verbally, rescue right in front of killer when killer is being awesome. which by the way if im hooked and you rescue me in front of the killer and he's not camping then I refuse to save you when it's you hooked. Thats my lesson to you.
I hate every second of it but keep coming back
Great fun game with friends if you can ignore the mostly toxic community.

Getting to hear Jake Park scream in my ear is the best thing that happened to me since Sims 2 got announced. I am now waiting on a remix for each and every one of the survivor's grunts and screams.

Thank you for giving this small joy to my small sadistic heart.
